headline: Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) Posts Q3 Sales In Line With Estimates, Stock Soars
summary: Heating, ventilation, air conditioning, and refrigeration company Carrier Global (NYSE:CARR) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, but sales fell by 6.8% year on year to $5.58 billion. The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $22.5 billion at the midpoint came in 1.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.67 per share was 17.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

The company’s full-year revenue guidance of $22.5 billion at the midpoint came in 1.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.67 per share was 17.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
